description: Welcome home to Sundays on Grant by Anthem, a modern community in a quiet, family-friendly pocket of West Coquitlam just 5 minutes from Burquitlam SkyTrain, shops, restaurants, and the YMCA. Located a short walk from Miller Park Elementary, Banting Middle School and the trails at Chines Park. This expansive 1,567 sf corner 3-bedroom + 2-den townhome features an open-concept main level with contemporary kitchen and high-end appliances flowing to a private patio ideal for outdoor living. The second level offers two bedrooms, a full bath and a flexible den perfect for storage or playroom. The third and top-level primary retreat includes a double-vanity ensuite, walk-in closet plus additional closet, and a bright windowed den ideal for a home office or nursery. Open by private appointment.
